title: Complete AI & Machine Learning Bootcamp 2024
description: Master artificial intelligence and machine learning from the ground up with hands-on projects. This comprehensive bootcamp covers neural networks, deep learning, natural language processing, and computer vision. You'll build real-world AI applications including a recommendation system, chatbot, and image classifier. Perfect for developers, data scientists, and AI enthusiasts looking to advance their careers in the fastest-growing field in tech.

modules.title: Introduction to AI and Machine Learning

lessons.title: Setting Up Your AI Development Environment

questions.question: What is the main difference between supervised and unsupervised learning?
options: Supervised uses labeled data, unsupervised doesn't

questions.question: Which of these is NOT a type of machine learning?

title: Full Stack Web Development with React & Node.js
description: Build modern web applications from scratch using the most popular technologies. Learn React for dynamic frontends, Node.js for powerful backends, and MongoDB for flexible databases. This project-based course includes building a social media app, e-commerce platform, and portfolio website. Perfect for aspiring web developers who want to land their first tech job or freelance successfully.

title: Digital Marketing & Growth Hacking Masterclass
description: Master the art and science of digital marketing in today's competitive landscape. Learn proven strategies for SEO, social media marketing, email campaigns, and conversion optimization. This course covers advanced growth hacking techniques used by successful startups and Fortune 500 companies. Includes real case studies, hands-on projects, and templates you can use immediately.

title: UI/UX Design Psychology & Principles
description: Design user experiences that convert and delight users. This comprehensive course covers design psychology, user research methods, wireframing, prototyping, and usability testing. Learn how to create intuitive interfaces that solve real problems while looking beautiful. Includes industry-standard tools like Figma, Adobe XD, and user testing platforms.

title: Data Science & Analytics with Python
description: Transform raw data into actionable insights using Python's most powerful libraries. Master pandas for data manipulation, matplotlib for visualization, and scikit-learn for machine learning. This advanced course covers statistical analysis, predictive modeling, and big data processing. Perfect for analysts, researchers, and professionals who want to make data-driven decisions.

title: Blockchain & Cryptocurrency Fundamentals
description: Understand the revolutionary technology behind cryptocurrencies and decentralized applications. This beginner-friendly course explains blockchain concepts, cryptocurrency trading, smart contracts, and DeFi protocols. No technical background required - perfect for investors, entrepreneurs, and curious individuals who want to understand the future of finance.
